name: APPLIFY
description:
NOT YOUR AVERAGE MOBILE APP DEVELOPER
Hiring Applify gets you an award winning design studio, an experienced development team, a product manager, a marketing ninja, a strategic business consultant and a startup genius – all in one. 
 
Applify is one of the leading mobile app development agencies with its offices in UK, US, UAE, Doha, Singapore & India. Applify thrives on its design and outsourced product superiority as opposed to its competitors. They have developed dozens of apps for prominent businesses and startups that have been successful in the market.  
WONDERING WHY & WHAT MAKES APPLIFY DIFFERENT THAN OTHERS?
1. Efficiency
You will be assigned to a dedicated account and a project manager who will do all the tracking and reporting for you. Their team works with bulls-eye focus and sheer dedication. The efficiency they come up with is not only for timely deliveries but also for the quality of the product you expect it to be. 
2. Reliability
Applify's project managers predict setbacks in advance and change the course letting the development progress with no setbacks. They take full responsibility of the project and enhance the idea if required as they go deep into development. You can learn more about their process and workflow from here. 
3. Award-winning Designs
The Design team at Applify is one of the most innovative teams at agencies around the world. They are global, inventive and reliable. They research on the competition before they start designing your product. You can check out all the apps designed by them here.
